amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to clarify that a persons credit report may be used if the rep ort is obtained in connection with a background check or related investigation of financial information that is required by a federal, state, or local law or regulation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to clarify that a persons credit report may be used if the rep ort is obtained in connection with a background check or related investigation of financial information that is required by a federal, state, or local law or regulation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steil amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Steil.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Steil amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
